```{r}
plant_m1 <- c(30.7,37.6,28.4,NA,33.2)
plant_m2 <- c(4,5.2,3.7,NA,4.6)
plant_m <- c(plant_m1,plant_m2)
plant_date <- matrix(plant_m, nrow = 5, byrow = F)
measure <- c("height", "weight")
plant_n <- c("plant 1","plant 2","plant 3","plant 4","plant 5")
rownames(plant_date) <- plant_n
colnames(plant_date) <- measure
mean <- colMeans(plant_date,na.rm=T)
plant_date_1 <- rbind(plant_date,mean)
plant_date_1
```
